00054             function                __construct()
00055             {
00056                   try
00057                   {
00058                         $this->BlockSettings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00059                         $this->Database = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00060                         $this->Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00061                         $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00062                   }
00063                   catch( Exception $e )
00064                   {
00065                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00066                   }

00103             function                compile_readioset( $Records , $Cols , $Name , $CurrentValue )
00104             {
00105                   try
00106                   {
00107                         $Counter = 0;
00108                         $Code  = '<table><tr>';
00109                         
00110                         foreach( $Records as $r )
00111                         {
00112                               if( $Counter == $Cols )
00113                               {
00114                                     $Counter = 0;
00115                                     $Code .= '</tr><tr>';
00116                               }
00117                               
00118                               $Code .= "<td>{radio:name=$Name;value=$r->value;current_value=".
00119                                     "$CurrentValue;label=$r->label}</td>";
00120                               
00121                               $Counter++;
00122                         }
00123                         
00124                         return( $Code .= '</tr></table>' );
00125                   }
00126                   catch( Exception $e )
00127                   {
00128                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00129                   }
00130             }
00131             
00158             function                process_radioset( $Str , $Changed )
00159             {
00160                   try
00161                   {
00162                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'radioset' ) ; )
00163                         {
00164                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00165                               
00166                               list( $Cols , $Name , $Query )= $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'cols,name,query' );
00167 
00168                               $CurrentValue = $this->Security->get_gp( $Name , 'command' , '' );
00169                               
00170                               $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00171                               $Records = $this->Database->query( $Query );
00172                               $Records = $this->Database->fetch_results( $Records );
00173                               
00174                               $Code = $this->compile_readioset( $Records , $Cols , $Name , $CurrentValue );
00175                               $Str = str_replace( "{radioset:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
00176 
00177                               $Changed = true;
00178                         }
00179                         
00180                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00181                   }
00182                   catch( Exception $e )
00183                   {
00184                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00185                   }
00186             }
00187             
00210             function                get_checked( &$Settings )
00211             {
00212                   try
00213                   {
00214                         $Value = $Settings->get_setting( 'value' );
00215                         $Name = $Settings->get_setting( 'name' );
00216                         
00217                         if( $this->Security->get_gp( $Name ) )
00218                         {
00219                               $CurrentValue = $this->Security->get_gp( $Name , 'string' );
00220                         }
00221                         else
00222                         {
00223                               $CurrentValue = $Settings->get_setting( 'default' , $Value );
00224                         }
00225 
00226                         $Checked = $Value === $CurrentValue ? $Checked = 'checked' : '';
00227                         
00228                         return( $Checked );
00229                   }
00230                   catch( Exception $e )
00231                   {
00232                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00233                   }
00234             }

00258             function                compile_readio( &$Settings )
00259             {
00260                   try
00261                   {
00262                         $Name = $Settings->get_setting( 'name' );
00263                         
00264                         $Value = $Settings->get_setting( 'value' );
00265                         
00266                         $Checked = $this->get_checked( $Settings );
00267                         
00268                         $id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime() ) );
00269 
00270                         $Template = "<input id=\"$id\" style=\"cursor: pointer;\" ".
00271                                                       "type=\"radio\" value=\"$Value\" $Checked name=\"$Name\">";
00272                                                       
00273                         $Label = $Settings->get_setting( 'label' , '' );
00274                         
00275                         if( $Label != '' )
00276                         {
00277                               $Template .= "<label for=\"$id\" style=\"cursor: pointer;\">{lang:$Label}</label>";
00278                         }
00279                         
00280                         return( $Template );
00281                   }
00282                   catch( Exception $e )
00283                   {
00284                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00285                   }
00286             }

00314             function                process_radio( $Str , $Changed )
00315             {
00316                   try
00317                   {
00318                         $Rules = array( 'value' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'current_value' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00319                         
00320                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'radio' , $Rules ) ; )
00321                         {
00322                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00323                               
00324                               $Radio = $this->compile_readio( $this->BlockSettings );
00325                               
00326                               $Str = str_replace( "{radio:$Parameters}" , $Radio , $Str );
00327                               $Changed = true;
00328                         }
00329                         
00330                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00331                   }
00332                   catch( Exception $e )
00333                   {
00334                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00335                   }
00336             }
00337             
00368             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00369             {
00370                   try
00371                   {
00372                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_radioset( $Str , $Changed );
00373 
00374                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_radio( $Str , $Changed );
00375 
00376                         return( $Str );
00377                   }
00378                   catch( Exception $e )
00379                   {
00380                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00381                   }
00382             }
